summary: A documentary that shows how George A. Romero gathered an unlikely team of Pittsburghers to shoot his seminal film: La noche de los muertos vivientes (1968).

keywords: zombie|making of|man wears eyeglasses|woman wears eyeglasses|living dead
title: Year of the Living Dead
